Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.storage.limited

Class LimitedStorageImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.storage.AbstractProxyStorage<T>
com.refinedmods.refinedstorage2.api.storage.limited.LimitedStorageImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of resource
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtractableStorage<T>, InsertableStorage<T>, LimitedStorage<T>, Storage<T>, StorageView<T>
@API(status=STABLE, since="2.0.0-milestone.1.2") public class LimitedStorageImpl<T> extends AbstractProxyStorage<T> implements LimitedStorage<T>
This class can decorate any other Storage to add a capacity to it. InsertableStorage.insert(Object, long, Action, Actor) operations will respect this capacity.
